Directives > ui-popup

ui-popup

Bottom placement

Click Me
Nancy Fancypants
Working in Assets 1
Clicking this link will close the popup 

<div class="item-name">Popup, Bottom placement</div>
<div class="item">
    <ui-button size="large" ui-popup-open="some-id4">Click Me</ui-button>
    <ui-popup id="some-id4" placement="bottom" offset-y="3" style="width: 240px; height: 100px;">
        <div>
            Nancy Fancypants
            <br/> Working in Assets 1
            <br/>
            <a ui-popup-close style="cursor: pointer; color: navy;">Clicking this link will close the popup</a>
        </div>
    </ui-popup>
</div>

Top placement, Modal, Dark, different arrow color

Click Me details for tab1
click to close
 details for tab2
click to close
 

<ui-button size="large" ui-popup-open="some-id5">Click Me</ui-button>
<ui-popup id="some-id5" modal="true" dark  placement="top" arrow-color='#2b3e50' style="width: 300px; height: 200px;">
    <ui-tabs selected-tab="tab1" style="width: 300px; height: 200px;">
        <ui-tab-option id="tab1" title="TAB1">
            details for tab1
            <div ui-popup-close>click to close</div>
        </ui-tab-option>
        <ui-tab-option id="tab2" title="TAB2">
            details for tab2
            <div ui-popup-close>click to close</div>
        </ui-tab-option>
    </ui-tabs>
</ui-popup>

ui-popup Options

Name type description
placement string The placement of the popup relative to the calling element. Can be either one of: left, right, top, bottom, left-center, right-center, top-center, bottom-center
offset-x integer Any custom offset on the x-axis from the calling element that is to be applied for the popup.
offset-y integer Any custom offset on the y-axis from the calling element that is to be applied for the popup.
modal boolean Indicates if the popup should be displayed as a modal. In this case, clicking outside the popup will not dismiss it. It must be explictly closed from within the popup using the ui-popup-close directive.
arrow-color string If present, indicates the color of the popup arrow.
pass-through boolean Indicates if the mouse events should pass through whilst the popup is open. In this case, clicking outside the popup still closes it, but the click event (and all other mouse events) get propagated to the underlying application.
container-id string The DOM identifier of the container in which the popup is to be displayed. If not provided, the document body is used as the container. This container is then used to calculate the placement of the popup.
on-open function Optional callback function to be invoked when the popup opens.
on-close function Optional callback function to be invoked when the popup closes.
on-fully-open function Optional callback function to be invoked when the popup is opened and correctly positioned in the viewport.
focus-input Optional attribute. If supplied, the first "blank" input text field or textarea will get focused each time the dialog opens. If no blank field is found, the first input field or textarea is focused.
